content: We are down to the last 6 issues on the FSH STU 1 ballot. They are listed in the enclosed spreadsheet, and can be queried directly using project="FHIR" AND Specification = "Shorthand (FHIR) [FHIR-shorthand]" and Grouping = Block-Vote-5. I would like to get this vote up for consideration on the agenda for August 3 if that is possible. As always, please let me know if you would like anything pulled from the block for individual consideration. Jira-2020-07-23T20_42_30-0400.csv
